title: Bevacizumab
summary: Bevacizumab, sold under the brand name Avastin, is a medication used to treat a number of types of cancers and a specific eye disease.[9][10] For cancer, it is given by slow injection into a vein (intravenous) and used for colon cancer, lung cancer, glioblastoma, and renal-cell carcinoma. In many of these diseases it is used as a first-line therapy.[9][10] For age-related macular degeneration it is given by injection into the eye (intravitreal).[9]
